headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Corning (GLW) After Its Rapid Share Price Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Corning's current share price still offers value or if the story is already played out, this article will walk through what the numbers are actually saying about the stock. Corning's share price closed at US$150.38, with returns of 7.8% over the last week, 44.2% over the last month, 65.9% year to date, 204.4% over the past year, and 360.4% over three years and five years. Recent attention on Corning has been shaped by broader interest in established tech and...
